title: FS - T213-2 Baker NY and Cree -Both Sold

posts.post_title: FS - T213-2 Baker NY and Cree -Both Sold
posts.post_content:
I have upgraded both cards recently so time to give these a new home.  Prices include secure delivery in bubble mailer.  PayPal F&F preferred, cash or check ok too.  Please PM me with any interest or questions.  Thanks, Mike.



Baker NY - a well loved, tough to find card - $SOLD



[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/bakerfront_zps5a5e7ebc.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/bakerreverse_zps6b142c28.jpg[/IMG]



Cree NY - nice card with vertical crease and corner wear. Nice reverse. - $SOLD

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e230/tistaT206/NY%20Amer%20T-Cards/CreeT213-2reverse-1.jpg[/IMG]
